3/* localize.h (i18n/l10n) */
4/* $OpenLDAP$ */
5/* This work is part of OpenLDAP Software <http://www.openldap.org/>.

18
19#ifndef _AC_LOCALIZE_H
20#define _AC_LOCALIZE_H
21
22#ifdef LDAP_LOCALIZE
23
24# include <locale.h>
25# include <libintl.h>
26
27 /* enable i18n/l10n */
28# define gettext_noop(s) s
29# define _(s) gettext(s)
30# define N_(s) gettext_noop(s)
31# define ldap_pvt_setlocale(c,l) ((void) setlocale(c, l))
32# define ldap_pvt_textdomain(d) ((void) textdomain(d))
33# define ldap_pvt_bindtextdomain(p,d) ((void) bindtextdomain(p, d))
34
35#else
36
37 /* disable i18n/l10n */
38# define _(s) s
39# define N_(s) s
40# define ldap_pvt_setlocale(c,l) ((void) 0)
41# define ldap_pvt_textdomain(d) ((void) 0)
42# define ldap_pvt_bindtextdomain(p,d) ((void) 0)
43
44#endif
45
46#endif /* _AC_LOCALIZE_H */
47
